dmca.title: [ABUSE] French Ligue de Football Professionnel : AV infringement - LFP_NRID 13196
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2006 10:44 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] French Ligue de Football Professionnel : AV
infringement - LFP_NRID 13196]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
From:         - Wed Apr 12 10:41:24 2006
X-Mozilla-Status:         0001
X-Mozilla-Status2:         00000000
Received:         from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52]) by
mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
with esmtp (Exim) id 1FThSe-0007b0-Du; Wed, 12 Apr 2006 10:40:52 -0500
Received:         from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180]
helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
TimC@nr-online.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id
1FThSd-0007ap-0a for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 12 Apr 2006 10:40:51 -0500
Received:         from email.nr-online.com ([217.204.130.186]) by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from TimC@nr-online.com) with esmtps
(TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1FThSa-000HIj-PH for
abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 12 Apr 2006 10:40:50 -0500
Received:         (qmail 2259 invoked by uid 89); 12 Apr 2006 16:39:42 +0100
Received:         from unknown (HELO D6YK112J) (192.168.50.112) by 0 (qmail
1.03 + ejcp v14) with SMTP; 12 Apr 2006 16:39:42 +0100
From:         Tim Cooper <TimC@nr-online.com>
To:         <adminfss@gmail.com>
Date:         Wed, 12 Apr 2006 16:40:41 +0100
MIME-Version:         1.0
Content-Type:         multipart/alternative;
boundary="----=_NextPart_000_00EB_01C65E4F.D65DD9E0"
X-Mailer:         Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.6353
Thread-Index:         AcZeDdj1pHCa09jMSgiOSVPy1HaJEgAOJwEwAAA49mA=
X-MimeOLE:         Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2670
Received-SPF:         pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of nr-online.com
designates 217.204.130.186 as permitted sender) client-ip=217.204.130.186;
envelope-from=TimC@nr-online.com; helo=email.nr-online.com;
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -99.5
Cc:         abuse@theplanet.com
Subject:         [ABUSE] French Ligue de Football Professionnel : AV
infringement - LFP_NRID 13196
X-BeenThere:         abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.7
Precedence:         list
List-Id:         <abuse.lists.theplanet.com>
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post:         <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help:         <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com



NetResult Internal Reference:  LFP_NRID13196



Please quote the above LFP_NRID13196 reference in all communications with us
regarding this issue.



Dear Sirs,



We act on behalf of the French Ligue de Football Professionnel (hereinafter
referred to as the ?LFP?), which has the exclusive right to commercially
exploit all matches within the French football championships and notably the
Ligue 1R including, but not limited to, all moving images and other
audio/video content.



We have noticed that your Web Site http://fss.portaliraton.net/  is
displaying and/or offering the LFP?s audio visual content.



As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from the LFP to use this
content, your present use is an infringement of the LFP?s rights.



Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your web
sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so.



Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an
express or implied waiver of any of the LFP?s rights or remedies, including
any rights or remedies in respect of infringement not explicitly stated,
whether current or in the future, all of which are expressly reserved.





Formal Declaration





I hereby state that The Ligue de Football Professionnel is the owner of the
exclusive rights referenced above and that NetResult is authorised to act on
its behalf with respect to internet monitoring and compliance.
On behalf of Ligue de Football Professionnel I hereby state that I have a
good faith belief that use of the content in the manner complained of is not
authorised by Ligue de Football Professionnel, its agents, or the law.



Yours sincerely



Tim Cooper

Account Manager

Projector NetResult Ltd,

Mulberry House,

583 Fulham Road,

London,

SW6 5UA



e     timc@nr-online.com

w     www.nr-online.com

t     +44 (0)20 7471 1735

f     +44 (0)7092 313 434





This email and the documents attached to this email contain information
which is confidential and / or privileged. If you are not the intended
recipient, you are notified that any dissemination of this communication is
strictly prohibited.




-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFEPSBbvK/XpJs6oyURAhkZAJ9jxCzo8eI2ra+SCs/xxhnDkP+ALgCfVlR3
Yvjgq4TW/e1rM4NLK5zv0+k=
=sFzd
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
